snippet: Prosecutors closed an investigation of 17 former German SS soldiers who were part of a unit involved in a Nazi wartime massacre of more than 500 civilians.
abstract: German prosecutors say they have closed their investigation of 17 former German SS soldiers who were part of a unit involved in Nazi wartime massacre of more than 500 civilians in Italy, citing lack of evidence.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors closed an investigation of 17 former German SS soldiers who were part of a unit involved in a Nazi wartime massacre of more than 500 civilians.
